titleStmt.title: The proceedings observed in order to, and in the consecration of the twelve bishops, at St. Patricks Church, Dublin, on Sunday the 27. of January 1660. Being an account given by Dr. Dudley Loftus, vicar general for the Kingdom of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Loftus, Dudley, 1619-1695.

titleStmt.title: The proceedings observed in order to, and in the consecration of the twelve bishops, at St. Patricks Church, Dublin, on Sunday the 27. of January 1660. Being an account given by Dr. Dudley Loftus, vicar general for the Kingdom of Ireland.
